      • getProjectUsersPage

        @RequestMapping({"/{projectId}/settings/members","/{projectId}/settings/members/edit"})
public String getProjectUsersPage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                  Principal principal,
                                  @PathVariable
                                  Long projectId)
        Gets the name of the template for the project members page. Populates the template with standard info.
        Parameters:
        model - Model
        principal - Principal
        projectId - Id for the project to show the users for
        Returns:
        The name of the project members page.

      • addProjectGroupMember

        @RequestMapping(value="/{projectId}/settings/groups",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,​String> addProjectGroupMember​(@PathVariable
                                                      Long projectId,
                                                      @RequestParam
                                                      Long memberId,
                                                      @RequestParam
                                                      String projectRole,
                                                      Locale locale)
        Add a group to a project
        Parameters:
        projectId - The ID of the project
        memberId - The ID of the user
        projectRole - The role for the user on the project
        locale - the reported locale of the browser
        Returns:
        map for showing success message.

      • getGroupsAvailableForProject

        @RequestMapping("/{projectId}/settings/ajax/availablegroupmembers")
@ResponseBody
public Collection<UserGroup> getGroupsAvailableForProject​(@PathVariable
                                                          Long projectId,
                                                          @RequestParam
                                                          String term)
        Search the list of users who could be added to a project
        Parameters:
        projectId - The ID of the project
        term - A search term
        Returns:
        A Map<Long,String> of the userID and user label

      • removeUserGroup

        @RequestMapping(path="{projectId}/settings/groups/{userId}",
                method=DELETE)
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,​String> removeUserGroup​(@PathVariable
                                                Long projectId,
                                                @PathVariable
                                                Long userId,
                                                Locale locale)
        Remove a user group from a project
        Parameters:
        projectId - The project to remove from
        userId - The user to remove
        locale - Locale of the logged in user
        Returns:
        Success or error message

      • updateUserGroupRole

        @RequestMapping(path="{projectId}/settings/groups/editrole/{userId}",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,​String> updateUserGroupRole​(@PathVariable
                                                    Long projectId,
                                                    @PathVariable
                                                    Long userId,
                                                    @RequestParam
                                                    String projectRole,
                                                    Locale locale)

        Parameters:
        projectId - The ID of the project
        userId - The ID of the user
        projectRole - The role to set
        locale - Locale of the logged in user
        Returns:
        Success or failure message

      • getProjectGroupMembers

        @RequestMapping("/{projectId}/settings/ajax/groups")
@ResponseBody
public DataTablesResponse getProjectGroupMembers​(@DataTablesRequest
                                                 DataTablesParams params,
                                                 @PathVariable
                                                 Long projectId)
        Get a page of groups on the project for display in a DataTable.
        Parameters:
        params - the datatables criteria for filtering/sorting groups
        projectId - the id of the project we're looking at
        Returns:
        a DataTablesResponseModel of groups on the project

      • getRemoveUserGroupModal

        @RequestMapping(path="/settings/removeUserGroupModal",
                method=POST)
public String getRemoveUserGroupModal​(@RequestParam
                                      Long memberId,
                                      org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Get a string to tell the user which group they're going to delete.
        Parameters:
        memberId - the user group that's about to be deleted.
        model - Model for rendering the view
        Returns:
        Name of the user group removal modal
